ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of potato soup
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Want comfort food in ten minutes tops? Here's a time-saving recipe that fills your belly with very little preparation. Serve with crusty bread."
ins: Stir cream-style corn, potato soup, and water together in a saucepan over medium heat; add diced ham and green onion. Cook soup mixture, stirring occasionally, until completely hot, about 5 minutes. Remove soup from heat. Stir parsley through the soup; season with salt and black pepper.
